segments.content: This year, I would like to make the newsletter a little more digestible. Do you have any suggestions for me? Do you think I put too many links and some can be deleted? Or do you like the exhaustive side? My goal is to make this newsletter less time consuming to write so that I can offer you more interesting content, like original articles. I'll explain it all to you soon.

I'll explain it all to you soon.
segments.translated_content: 今年我想让这份简报更易于消化。大家有什么建议吗？是否觉得链接过多需要删减？还是喜欢目前这种详尽风格？我的目标是减少编写耗时，以便为大家提供更多原创文章等优质内容。具体计划将很快公布。

segments.content: With Astro 1, you had to make a global choice for the whole site: 100% static (SSG) or 100% server (SSR). With Astro 2.0 it is now possible to choose for each page. The article details the internal workings of the Astro build, and how it had to evolve to support this new feature. They use static analysis to separate static routes from SSR routes.
segments.sourceMdx: With Astro 1, you had to make a global choice for the whole site: 100% static (SSG) or 100% server (SSR). With Astro 2.0 it is now possible to choose for each page. The article details the internal workings of the Astro build, and how it had to evolve to support this new feature. They use static analysis to separate static routes from SSR routes.
segments.translated_content: Astro 1需要全站统一选择静态生成(SSG)或服务端渲染(SSR)。Astro 2.0现支持按页面选择。文章详解了构建机制如何演进实现该特性，他们通过静态分析分离静态路由与SSR路由。

segments.content: Dominik explains why React is not about to die. React popularized JSX and the concept of component and declarative UI. The alternatives take the good parts and try to solve the problems, but it will be difficult to challenge it given the size of its ecosystem and its community that only gets stronger with time. It would take a big breakthrough innovation. Framework agnostic libraries (TanStack) have a role to play and allow to transfer knowledge from one ecosystem to another.
segments.sourceMdx: Dominik explains why React is not about to die. React popularized JSX and the concept of component and declarative UI. The alternatives take the good parts and try to solve the problems, but it will be difficult to challenge it given the size of its ecosystem and its community that only gets stronger with time. It would take a big breakthrough innovation. Framework agnostic libraries (TanStack) have a role to play and allow to transfer knowledge from one ecosystem to another.
segments.translated_content: Dominik解析了React的生命力源泉：它开创了JSX和声明式组件理念。竞品虽在解决问题，但难以撼动其庞大的生态和持续壮大的社区。真正挑战需要突破性创新。像TanStack这样的框架无关库，则促进了跨生态知识迁移。

segments.content: [![Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](/emails/issues/133/qwik.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](/emails/issues/133/qwik.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)

segments.content: **[Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Resumable React: How To Use React Inside Qwik](https://www.builder.io/blog/resumable-react-how-to-use-react-inside-qwik)**

segments.content: This article highlights the integration between Qwik and React. Qwik is an innovative framework in beta, based on resumability rather than hydration. It exposes a method `qwikify$()` that allows to adapt an existing React component to be used in a Qwik app, with several possible hydration modes. To reduce the size of the bundle as much as possible, it is possible to avoid hydrating the React component and to use the native DOM events directly.
segments.sourceMdx: This article highlights the integration between Qwik and React. Qwik is an innovative framework in beta, based on resumability rather than hydration. It exposes a method `qwikify$()` that allows to adapt an existing React component to be used in a Qwik app, with several possible hydration modes. To reduce the size of the bundle as much as possible, it is possible to avoid hydrating the React component and to use the native DOM events directly.
segments.translated_content: 本文重点介绍Qwik与React的集成方案。Qwik是基于可恢复性（非水合）的创新框架，通过`qwikify$()`方法适配React组件，提供多种水合模式。为极致优化包体积，可直接使用原生DOM事件避免水合React组件。

segments.content:
* 💬 [Replace Create React App recommendation with Vite - Dan Abramov answers](https://github.com/reactjs/reactjs.org/pull/5487#issuecomment-1409720741): long comment from Dan. Tells the CRA story, goal, and future with 5 possible options. TLDR: they don't want to deprecate CRA but don't want to recommend it either: depriving yourself of SSG/SSR is not a good thing. It is possible that the CRA CLI will become a launcher that offers a choice between several popular frameworks: Next.js, Remix, CRA...
* 👀 [AsyncContext + React](https://twitter.com/sebmarkbage/status/1620442034598477824): Sebastian Markbåge brings the idea of using TC39 stage 0 proposal [AsyncContext](https://github.com/legendecas/proposal-async-context) directly as React context 🤔
* 👀 ["Statically typed links are coming to Next.js"](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1620137501192253440): great news for typesafe routing. Maybe this will be implemented with their new [TypeScript language server plugin](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1592209522281439232), instead of a codegen step?
* 👀 [Coming soon to Next.js - improved SEO support!](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1619743437577912321): new `metadata` export (will also be [typed with the new TS plugin?](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1619775431921762304))
* 📜 [The Key To Good Component Design Is Selfishness](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2023/01/key-good-component-design-selfishness/): the story a `<Button>` component design over time. It goes wrong because of using props to drive internal button content. It is worth limiting the responsibility of the button, using `children` and composition.
* 📜 [Storybook - Component Story Format 3 is here](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-csf3-is-here/): the new format comes out of beta and brings interesting improvements (boilerplate, composition, `play` function...) while remaining backward compatible.
* 📜 [How to create one form with many actions in Remix](https://www.wking.dev/library/how-to-create-one-form-with-many-actions-in-remix): use HTML buttons with `name` and `value` props, and use TypeScript union types with a schema for each action type.
* 📜 [Nextra 2 – Next.js Static Site Generator](https://the-guild.dev/blog/nextra-2): presents the main new features of Nextra v2, the static-site-generator for Next.js.
* 📜 [How Netlify Uses Storybook for Visual Regression Testing](https://www.netlify.com/blog/storybook-visual-regression-testing/)
* 📜 [The Curious Case of React](https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/the-curious-case-of-react/)
* 🎥 [Andrew Clark on the Creation of Redux](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WvRcZkuXmpo): this interview that relates the 2014-2015 period, good teaser of the [React documentary](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmp0istg5xo) that will be released soon. Redux offered the most elegant Flux implementation, and popularized the concept of reducer. Andrew doesn't disavow the project, but is happy that React is progressively proposing better alternatives for things like data fetching.
* 🎥 [I Was Wrong About Nested React Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sAdzy90GtE): Jack illustrates well why you shouldn't declare one component inside another.
* 🎥 [Scroll Management with Remix and React Router](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_H8j3rkpjI)
* 🎥 [State of React Ecosystem Jan 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_nGuk2Gs2oc)
* 📦 [Redwood 4.0](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/redwood-v4-0-0-is-now-available/4538): official release of v4.0 with a new Auth API, GraphQL Yoga v3, GraphQL Armor...
* 📦 [Remix 1.12](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.12.0): new dev server preview, behind a flag.
* 📦 [React Router 6.8.0](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/releases/tag/react-router%406.8.0)
* 📦 [Jotai v2](https://twitter.com/jotaijs/status/1620436882034421762)
* 📦 [Docusaurus 2.3](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/2.3)
* 📦 [TinyBase 3.0](https://twitter.com/tinybasejs/status/1619763700650614784)
* 📦 [Redux Toolkit 1.9.2](https://twitter.com/acemarke/status/1619445949822009346)
* 🤖 [Houston - Astro Assitant AI](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1619053233082859521): the Astro doc has its own AI to answer your questions. Remix seems to want to [do the same](https://twitter.com/mjackson/status/1619419579754889218).
* 🐦 [Lee Robinson - "new version of my website"](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1620073039131213824)

segments.translated_content:
- 💬 [取代Create React App推荐方案为Vite - Dan Abramov回应](https://github.com/reactjs/reactjs.org/pull/5487#issuecomment-1409720741): Dan的长篇评论。讲述了CRA的历史、目标和未来5种可能方向。要点：团队既不想废弃CRA也不愿继续推荐它——放弃SSG/SSR支持并非明智之举。CRA CLI可能转型为启动器，提供Next.js、Remix、CRA等多个流行框架的选择...
- 👀 [AsyncContext + React](https://twitter.com/sebmarkbage/status/1620442034598477824): Sebastian Markbåge提出将TC39第0阶段提案[AsyncContext](https://github.com/legendecas/proposal-async-context)直接作为React上下文使用的构想🤔
- 👀 ["Next.js即将实现静态类型路由"](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1620137501192253440): 类型安全路由的重大进展。可能会通过其新型[TypeScript语言服务器插件](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1592209522281439232)实现，而非代码生成步骤？
- 👀 [Next.js即将推出——增强版SEO支持！](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1619743437577912321): 新的`metadata`导出（是否也会通过[新版TS插件实现类型化？](https://twitter.com/shuding_/status/1619775431921762304)）
- 📜 [优秀组件设计的核心是自私性](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2023/01/key-good-component-design-selfishness/): 讲述一个`<Button>`组件随时间的演变过程。由于使用props驱动按钮内部内容导致设计失控。关键在于通过`children`和组合模式限制按钮职责范围。
- 📜 [Storybook - 组件故事格式3正式发布](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-csf3-is-here/): 新格式结束测试阶段，在保持向后兼容的同时带来显著改进（样板代码减少、组合能力、`play`函数等）。
- 📜 [如何在Remix中创建多操作表单](https://www.wking.dev/library/how-to-create-one-form-with-many-actions-in-remix): 使用带`name`和`value`属性的HTML按钮，配合TypeScript联合类型为每种操作类型定义模式。
- 📜 [Nextra 2 – Next.js静态站点生成器](https://the-guild.dev/blog/nextra-2): 介绍Next.js静态站点生成工具Nextra v2的主要新特性。
- 📜 [Netlify如何利用Storybook进行视觉回归测试](https://www.netlify.com/blog/storybook-visual-regression-testing/)
- 📜 [React的奇妙案例](https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/the-curious-case-of-react/)
- 🎥 [Andrew Clark讲述Redux诞生史](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WvRcZkuXmpo): 这段访谈回顾2014-2015年时期，为即将发布的[React纪录片](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmp0istg5xo)预热。Redux提供了最优雅的Flux实现，并普及了reducer概念。Andrew并未否定该项目，但对React逐步提供更好的数据获取替代方案表示欣慰。
- 🎥 [关于嵌套React组件我错了](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sAdzy90GtE): Jack生动演示为何不应在组件内部声明另一个组件。
- 🎥 [Remix与React Router的滚动管理](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_H8j3rkpjI)
- 🎥 [2023年1月React生态现状](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_nGuk2Gs2oc)
- 📦 [Redwood 4.0发布](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/redwood-v4-0-0-is-now-available/4538): 正式版包含全新Auth API、GraphQL Yoga v3、GraphQL Armor等特性。
- 📦 [Remix 1.12](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.12.0): 实验性新开发服务器预览。
- 📦 [React Router 6.8.0](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/releases/tag/react-router%406.8.0)
- 📦 [Jotai v2发布](https://twitter.com/jotaijs/status/1620436882034421762)
- 📦 [Docusaurus 2.3](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/2.3)
- 📦 [TinyBase 3.0](https://twitter.com/tinybasejs/status/1619763700650614784)
- 📦 [Redux Toolkit 1.9.2](https://twitter.com/acemarke/status/1619445949822009346)
- 🤖 [Houston - Astro人工智能助手](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1619053233082859521): Astro文档集成AI问答功能。Remix似乎也打算[跟进](https://twitter.com/mjackson/status/1619419579754889218)。
- 🐦 [Lee Robinson - "个人网站新版上线"](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1620073039131213824)
**[可扩展的JavaScript调查问卷与表单库](https://surveyjs.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=referral)**

segments.content: [SurveyJS](https://github.com/surveyjs) is a set of open-source JavaScript form libraries that you can easily integrate into your web app. It lets you **create and run multiple forms**, retaining all sensitive data on your servers, or have **your own self-hosted WYSIWYG form builder** that non-tech users can use directly.
segments.sourceMdx: [SurveyJS](https://github.com/surveyjs) is a set of open-source JavaScript form libraries that you can easily integrate into your web app. It lets you **create and run multiple forms**, retaining all sensitive data on your servers, or have **your own self-hosted WYSIWYG form builder** that non-tech users can use directly.
segments.translated_content: [SurveyJS](https://github.com/surveyjs) 是一套开源JavaScript表单库，可轻松集成至您的Web应用。它能帮助您**创建并运行多种表单**，所有敏感数据保留在您的服务器上，或拥有**自主托管的可视化表单构建器**供非技术人员直接使用。

segments.content: You can also **analyze survey results** in custom-built dashboards, save your forms to PDF, or simply **convert them to editable PDF files**. It offers native support for **React and Angular rendering** and total freedom of choice as to the backend, because **any server + database combination is fully compatible**.
segments.sourceMdx: You can also **analyze survey results** in custom-built dashboards, save your forms to PDF, or simply **convert them to editable PDF files**. It offers native support for **React and Angular rendering** and total freedom of choice as to the backend, because **any server + database combination is fully compatible**.
segments.translated_content: 您还可以**在自定义仪表板中分析调查结果**，将表单保存为PDF，或直接**转换为可编辑的PDF文件**。它原生支持**React和Angular渲染**，并提供完全的后端选择自由，因为**任何服务器与数据库组合均可完全兼容**。

segments.content:
* 📜 [React Native 0.71-RC0 Android outage postmortem](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/01/27/71rc1-android-outage-postmortem): the React-Native team looks back at the blocked Android builds of November 2022 caused by a Maven release and a dynamic Gradle version dependency.
* 📜 [Summary of 2022 — React Native Open Source at Software Mansion](https://blog.swmansion.com/summary-of-2022-react-native-open-source-at-software-mansion-9edf929db005): nice retrospective of Software Mansion, we can say that they have been very active this year!
* 📜 [Making Your React Native Gestures Feel Natural](https://shopify.engineering/making-react-native-gestures-feel-natural): presents some useful techniques (spring, velocity, resistance) to make your animations more natural.
* 📜 [Using Apache ECharts in React Native](https://medium.com/@chenzhiqing/using-apache-echarts-in-react-native-55c6d555ac03): introduces a new library that can render Apache EChart components on React-Native with either React-Native-SVG or React-Native-Skia.
* 📜 [Run Tests for Key Pieces of Your App](https://www.callstack.com/blog/run-tests-for-key-pieces-of-your-app)
* 📜 [Optimize Your Android Application’s Size with Gradle Settings](https://www.callstack.com/blog/optimize-android-application-size-with-gradle-settings)
* 📖 [Open Native Docs](https://twitter.com/ammarahm_ed/status/1620136052152500225): new online doc. Proposes to unify native libs to work on several ecosystems: React-Native, NativeScript, Flutter...
* 🎨 [Fabric + React-Native-macOS demo - WIP](https://twitter.com/ReactNativeMSFT/status/1619037832496156674)
* 🎨 [Expo Router - Quick Notes demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619609828380540929)
* 🎨 [CSS Modules in Expo demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619179207250296833)
* 🐦 ["PS5 user interface using react native"](https://twitter.com/Kelset/status/1619991122130137089)
* 🐦 ["react-native-drawer-layout is back"](https://twitter.com/satya164/status/1620186837917786114)
* 📦 [React-Native 0.70.7](https://twitter.com/CipolleschiR/status/1620468072493752320)
* 📦 [react-native-select-pro](https://github.com/MobileReality/react-native-select-pro)
* 🎙 [React-Native-Radio 257 - How can we improve React Native, part 2 - Meta Responds! ](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-257-meta-responds-how-can-we-improve-react-native-part-2)
* 🎙️ [The React Native Show 20 - Remotion and Animations in React Native with Jonny Burger](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VW5Gluxa4w)

segments.translated_content:
- 📜 [React Native 0.71-RC0 Android故障事后分析](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2023/01/27/71rc1-android-outage-postmortem)：React-Native团队回顾了2022年11月因Maven发布和动态Gradle版本依赖导致的Android构建阻塞问题。
- 📜 [2022年度总结——Software Mansion的React Native开源贡献](https://blog.swmansion.com/summary-of-2022-react-native-open-source-at-software-mansion-9edf929db005)：Software Mansion的年度回顾，可见他们今年非常活跃！
- 📜 [让React Native手势交互更自然](https://shopify.engineering/making-react-native-gestures-feel-natural)：介绍了一些实用技巧（弹性动画、速度控制、阻力效果）使动画更符合自然交互。
- 📜 [在React Native中使用Apache ECharts](https://medium.com/@chenzhiqing/using-apache-echarts-in-react-native-55c6d555ac03)：介绍了一个新库，可通过React-Native-SVG或React-Native-Skia在React-Native上渲染Apache EChart组件。
- 📜 [为应用核心模块运行测试](https://www.callstack.com/blog/run-tests-for-key-pieces-of-your-app)
- 📜 [通过Gradle设置优化Android应用体积](https://www.callstack.com/blog/optimize-android-application-size-with-gradle-settings)
- 📖 [Open Native文档](https://twitter.com/ammarahm_ed/status/1620136052152500225)：新上线的文档。旨在统一跨生态系统的原生库支持：React-Native、NativeScript、Flutter...
- 🎨 [Fabric + React-Native-macOS演示 - 开发中](https://twitter.com/ReactNativeMSFT/status/1619037832496156674)
- 🎨 [Expo Router - 快速笔记演示](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619609828380540929)
- 🎨 [Expo中的CSS Modules演示](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1619179207250296833)
- 🐦 ["使用react native实现的PS5用户界面"](https://twitter.com/Kelset/status/1619991122130137089)
- 🐦 ["react-native-drawer-layout回归"](https://twitter.com/satya164/status/1620186837917786114)

🧑‍💼 [**TLDR - 高级软件工程师（远程，12-20万美元）**](https://tldr.tech/jobs/senior-software-engineer/23?utm_source=thisweekinreact)

segments.content: The TLDR newsletter is hiring its first engineer to help build out the hiring platform along with other internal projects. Looking for someone with experience shipping side projects or on small teams, with experience in Next.js and Postgres/Supabase.
segments.sourceMdx: The TLDR newsletter is hiring its first engineer to help build out the hiring platform along with other internal projects. Looking for someone with experience shipping side projects or on small teams, with experience in Next.js and Postgres/Supabase.
segments.translated_content: TLDR通讯正在招聘首位工程师，协助搭建招聘平台及其他内部项目。寻求具备Next.js和Postgres/Supabase经验，曾主导过个人项目或小型团队开发的候选人。

segments.content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.sourceMdx: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.translated_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 高级React Native开发工程师 - 完全远程，B2B合同月薪净收入2.1-3.2万波兰兹罗提**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.sourceMdx: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.translated_content: 您是否希望参与全球最热门应用的开发？是否渴望共同塑造React Native技术的未来？加入Callstack这支由React与React Native技术领袖组成的团队。详情请访问官网。我们期待您的申请——请尽情展示您的实力！

segments.content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is \~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe\_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.sourceMdx: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.translated_content: 我们开放多个React Native开发岗位！年薪约16万美元外加10%奖金。需具备RN生产环境经验且居住在美国。私信[@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i)了解详情，并注明通过This Week in React获悉此机会。

segments.content:
* [TC39 January 2023 meeting](https://github.com/babel/proposals/issues/86): great proposals like [Immutable Array methods (change array by copy)](https://twitter.com/AndaristRake/status/1620154153250217988) or [Symbols as WeakMap keys](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1620385689853661185) are progressing to stage 4.
* [TypeScript 5.0 Beta](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-0-beta/): this [video by Matt Pocock](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOTAFRFgm8I) highlights some of the most interesting features such as decorators and const type parameters.
* [Release Notes for Safari Technology Preview 162](https://webkit.org/blog/13703/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-162/): CSS nesting, declarative shadow DOM...
* [Scrollend, a new JavaScript event](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scrollend-a-new-javascript-event/): already in Chrome, Firefox and polyfills available.
* ["Turbopack is adding support for webpack loaders"](https://twitter.com/jaredpalmer/status/1619071988181651456)
* [What’s next for Flutter](https://medium.com/flutter/whats-next-for-flutter-b94ce089f49c)
* [You’ve Got Options for Removing Event Listeners](https://www.macarthur.me/posts/options-for-removing-event-listeners)
* [Deno 1.30: Built-in Node modules](https://deno.com/blog/v1.30)
* [10 Web Development Trends in 2023](https://www.robinwieruch.de/web-development-trends/)
* [2023 State of Databases for Serverless & Edge](https://leerob.io/blog/backend)
* [Improve your test experience with Playwright Soft Assertions](https://timdeschryver.dev/blog/improve-your-test-experience-with-playwright-soft-assertions)
segments.sourceMdx:
- [TC39 January 2023 meeting](https://github.com/babel/proposals/issues/86): great proposals like [Immutable Array methods (change array by copy)](https://twitter.com/AndaristRake/status/1620154153250217988) or [Symbols as WeakMap keys](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1620385689853661185) are progressing to stage 4.
- [TypeScript 5.0 Beta](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-0-beta/): this [video by Matt Pocock](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOTAFRFgm8I) highlights some of the most interesting features such as decorators and const type parameters.
- [Release Notes for Safari Technology Preview 162](https://webkit.org/blog/13703/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-162/): CSS nesting, declarative shadow DOM...
- [Scrollend, a new JavaScript event](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scrollend-a-new-javascript-event/): already in Chrome, Firefox and polyfills available.
- ["Turbopack is adding support for webpack loaders"](https://twitter.com/jaredpalmer/status/1619071988181651456)
- [What’s next for Flutter](https://medium.com/flutter/whats-next-for-flutter-b94ce089f49c)
- [You’ve Got Options for Removing Event Listeners](https://www.macarthur.me/posts/options-for-removing-event-listeners)
- [Deno 1.30: Built-in Node modules](https://deno.com/blog/v1.30)
- [10 Web Development Trends in 2023](https://www.robinwieruch.de/web-development-trends/)
- [2023 State of Databases for Serverless & Edge](https://leerob.io/blog/backend)
- [Improve your test experience with Playwright Soft Assertions](https://timdeschryver.dev/blog/improve-your-test-experience-with-playwright-soft-assertions)
segments.translated_content:
- [TC39 2023年1月会议](https://github.com/babel/proposals/issues/86)：多项重要提案取得进展，如[不可变数组方法（通过拷贝修改数组）](https://twitter.com/AndaristRake/status/1620154153250217988)和[Symbol作为WeakMap键](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1620385689853661185)进入Stage 4阶段。
- [TypeScript 5.0 Beta发布](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-0-beta/)：Matt Pocock的[视频解析](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iOTAFRFgm8I)重点介绍了装饰器和const类型参数等亮点特性。
- [Safari Technology Preview 162版本说明](https://webkit.org/blog/13703/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-162/)：支持CSS嵌套、声明式Shadow DOM...
- [新增JavaScript事件Scrollend](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scrollend-a-new-javascript-event/)：已登陆Chrome和Firefox，并提供polyfill方案。
- ["Turbopack正在增加对webpack loader的支持"](https://twitter.com/jaredpalmer/status/1619071988181651456)
- [Flutter未来发展规划](https://medium.com/flutter/whats-next-for-flutter-b94ce089f49c)
- [移除事件监听器的多种方案](https://www.macarthur.me/posts/options-for-removing-event-listeners)
- [Deno 1.30：内置Node模块支持](https://deno.com/blog/v1.30)
- [2023年十大Web开发趋势](https://www.robinwieruch.de/web-development-trends/)
- [2023无服务器与边缘计算数据库现状](https://leerob.io/blog/backend)
- [通过Playwright软断言提升测试体验](https://timdeschryver.dev/blog/improve-your-test-experience-with-playwright-soft-assertions)
